messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Security Report

Thanks to the tireless efforts of our security and intelligence divisions, there are currently no credible threats to Murder Facility 13. All station construction projects have been authorized. Have a secure shift!

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Lifesign Alert

Unknown biological entities have been detected near Murder Facility 13, please stand-by.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Lifesign Alert

Unknown biological entities have been detected near Murder Facility 13, please stand-by.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Anomaly Alert

Ion storm detected near the station. Please check all AI-controlled equipment for errors.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Anomaly Alert

High levels of radiation detected near the station. Maintenance is best shielded from radiation.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Anomaly Alert

The radiation threat has passed. Please return to your workplaces.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Lifesign Alert

Unknown biological entities have been detected near Murder Facility 13, please stand-by.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
CentCom Diplomatic Corps

Cargo: The Spider Clan has sent us a mysterious gift. Can we ship it to you to see what's inside?
